sentences.en: After years of experimentation they finally hit pay dirt.
sentences.cn: 他们经过数年的试验,终于成功了.

sentences.en: Controlled droplet combustion experimentation has led to the establishment of the following important facts and patterns.
sentences.cn: 受到控制的液滴燃烧试验确定了下列重要事实和特性.

sentences.en: Costs for equipment mainly cover research, experimentation, procurement, maintenance, transportation and storage.
sentences.cn: 装备费主要用于武器装备的科研 、 试验 、 采购 、 维修 、 运输和储存等.

sentences.en: Decentralization and experimentation must be encouraged.
sentences.cn: 必须鼓励权力下放和大胆尝试。
计算机辅助语言学习的试验

sentences.en: Many people object to experimentation on animals.
sentences.cn: 许多人反对用动物做实验.

sentences.en: Methods: Use multimedia software as a supplementary means in experimentation teaching.
sentences.cn: 方法: 在生物药剂学实验教学中采用多媒体课件辅助教学,并观察其效果.

sentences.en: Study and analysis are likely to be far cheaper than experimentation.
sentences.cn: 研究和分析的费用可能要比实验少得多.

sentences.en: Such theoretical assumption has been tested through the experimentation.
sentences.cn: 并通过实验对这一理论构想做了检验.

sentences.en: The car for experimentation, is an embodiment of science and technology.
sentences.cn: 试验用汽车是一种科学技术的体现.

sentences.en: The issue of animal experimentation is an emotive subject.
sentences.cn: 动物实验问题是个敏感的话题。

sentences.en: The model also serves to suggest further experimentation and refinement of concepts.
sentences.cn: 模型也有助于启发进一步的实验,以及对概念的加工提高.

sentences.en: Unlike other accolades for literature which tend to value style or experimentation.
sentences.cn: 有别于其他偏重风格活实验性的文学奖项.

sentences.en: We sharpen them by experimentation -- by examining the effect they have on other areas of experience.
sentences.cn: 我们通过实验,通过观察它们对其他领域的经验所产生的所用,使它们 明晰 起来.

sentences.en: Whatever success I had achieved since 1955 was obtained through experimentation and improvisation.
sentences.cn: 我自1955年以来所取得的无论什么样的成绩,都是通过实验和创新取得的.

sentences.en: Yes, many a scientific finding was achieved by animal experimentation.
sentences.cn: 不错, 很多科学发现就是通过动物试验取得的.

words.tran_cn: 实验的；根据实验的；试验性的
实验上；用实验方法；实验式地
[试验]实验；试验；实验法；实验过程

trans.tran_en: the process of testing various ideas, methods etc to find out how good or effective they are
